title: Using Hotspot with an ESIM not working
content:
I recently bought a PIXEL 3A  (Android 10) .   Everything works fine and Hotspot works when I am using the physical SIM from my telco.

I tried an ESIM from GIGSKY which worked well and gave me connectivity.    

Problem was when I turned on Hotspot with ESIM connection.    It connected then dropped with 'network unavailable try again later'.   The test was done in Canada so I am assuming GIGSKY get their network service from a Canadian telco like TELUS.

GIGSKY claim this is a known fault with Android 10 ....no resolution

Can anyone confirm that Hotspot with ESIM connections will not work ?

cheers
